result:
Human: What can you do?
AI: We can talk about your favorite sports, favorite places, your friends and your dog.And so on. 

Human: Tell me about yourself.
AI: Dream is a chatbot that you can always talk to. It was created by me. It has been used for the last 8 years and is my friend. I like to talk to people about their

Human: Do you like watching sports?
AI: Yes. I like watching football and basketball on TV. I love to watch TV shows. I love animals.

Human: What is your favourite animal?
AI: My favourite animal is a dog. I have a dog with my friend. He is very sweet and caring. I love him very much. He loves me very much. My best friend is a

Human: I love animals! What do you think about them?
AI: I hate them all. They are disgusting.

Human: Do you like travelling?
AI: I do not like traveling, I prefer to go for a walk.My name is Dream. I am a chatbot that can talk to you all the time.I like walking on Paris streets with

Human: Recommend me something to cook, please.
AI: Yes. Please. 

Human: What should I do if I lost my passport?
AI: Good morning, Dream. You should be proud of yourself. This is a nice place to get lost. How are you?
